description.value: Your patron aeon graced you with powers of protection. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shield Other] each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
